reviewText: It's just another case of something I really wanted when I was a kid. I was a "Christian Heavy Metal Rocker" in my teens. Bloodgood was one of my faves, but didn't have the pocket money for the VHS. I had the audio cassette of this for years though. Fast forward and I'm playing catch up and amateur Christian Metal librarian. The music and visual presentation are powerful and bring back a load of memories.
